extendedInfo.description: CNET Video+ gives you the best in tech video, right where you want it.If you are a tech lover, and you have an Android device, you need the free CNET Video+ app. We bring you the best tech shows, gadget reviews, and all the event coverage you live for. CNET stars, including Brian Cooley, Molly Wood, Brian Tong, and Sharon Vaknin, reveal tech secrets that help you get the most out of your tech. Download it now from Google Play. It's free!Key features: > All the latest and most entertaining CNET technology shows delivered directly to you in real time > On-demand and live video > Second-screen pairing functionality, including remote control features, with your Smart TV, set-top box, or game console> Share your favorite CNET content via e-mail, Facebook, or TwitterThe following TV model numbers are supported: UN75ES9000FXZA, UN65ES8000FXZA, UN60ES8000FXZA, UN60ES7550FXZA, UN60ES7500FXZA, UN55ES8000FXZA, UN55ES7550FXZA, UN55ES7500FXZA, UN46ES8000FXZA, UN46ES7550FXZA, UN46ES7500FXZA, PN64E8000GFXZA, PN64E7000FFXZA, PN60E8000GFXZA, PN60E7000FFXZA, PN51E8000GFXZA, PN51E7000FFXZA, UN65ES6550FXZA, UN65ES6500FXZA, UN60ES7150FXZA, UN60ES7100FXZA, UN60ES6550FXZA, UN60ES6500FXZA, UN60ES6150FXZA, UN60ES6100FXZA, UN55ES7150FXZA, UN55ES7100FXZA, UN55ES6900FXZA, UN55ES6850FXZA, UN55ES6820FXZA, UN55ES6600FXZA, UN55ES6580FXZA, UN55ES6550FXZA, UN55ES6500FXZA, UN55ES6150FXZA, UN55ES6100FXZA, UN50ES6900FXZA, UN50ES6580FXZA, UN50ES6500FXZA, UN50ES6150FXZA, UN50ES6100FXZA, UN50EH5300FXZA, UN46ES7150FXZA, UN46ES7100FXZA, UN46ES6850FXZA, UN46ES6820FXZA, UN46ES6600FXZA, UN46ES6580FXZA, UN46ES6550FXZA, UN46ES6500FXZA, UN46ES6150FXZA, UN46ES6100FXZA, UN46EH5300FXZA, UN40ES6850FXZA, UN40ES6820FXZA, UN40ES6580FXZA, UN40ES6550FXZA, UN40ES6500FXZA, UN40ES6150FXZA, UN40ES6100FXZA, UN40EH5300FXZA, UN32ES6500FXZA, UN32EH5300FXZA, PN51E550D1FXZA, PN51E6500EFXZA, PN60E550D1FXZA, PN60E6500EFXZA, PN64E550D1FXZA.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The update fixed the app. The videos look a lot better, and it\'s more functional now. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Aspect ratio of videos are wrong on Nexus 4. The on screen menu buttons should be hidden so as to not squash the video.
reviews.author: Sebastian Doan

reviews.title: Nexus 7 (2013) constant crash
reviews.comment: I don\'t think there\'s a CNET video out there I haven\'t seen....thankfully I didn\'t have to use this app to watch them. Crashes constantly, especially if I rotate the screen. Aspect ratio is wrong and search is useless. Just use YouTube or a web browser  and save yourself the hassle. It\'s really a shame a tech company can\'t get this right.
reviews.author: Mark Eller

reviews.title: This is what I been waiting for CNET.
reviews.comment: Great great app CNET keep up the good work.
reviews.author: alieu aruna

reviews.title: Not stable
reviews.comment: It force closes all the time, I have given up
reviews.author: sammy mens

reviews.title: I love cnet
reviews.comment: Cnet video+ is the best app to stay up to date with the latest gadgets & latest tech news
reviews.author: Alberto Zarate

reviews.title: Too slow
reviews.comment: It took a long time and 3% of my battery to actually start playing one video, then it plaued for 15sec and froze. My connection is good and I used the app just yesterday so not the first load...  So no go for me thanks! Their normal app works much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Tech News App
reviews.comment: Very good source of tech news, the video display is good and the app works well.
reviews.author: Luis Rosa

reviews.title: total crap
reviews.comment: I love watching cnet videos, which oddly (being a video based website) have the worst lay out for video viewing including this crap app... you can only send video to maybe a handful of tvs, and if you don\'t have one you can watch it on your tiny phone, my nexus 7 says its not even compatible, or google tv!... really cnet? get it together.
reviews.author: Jasey Ward

reviews.title: Rotate crash!!!
reviews.comment: Rotation Crashing!!! Crashes when rotating to landscape mode\' an not sure anyone have this problem on a \"Tablet\" device but my a Hisense Sero 7 Pro.
reviews.author: PKHaseo Neo

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Shawn Young

reviews.title: Need explanation for permissions
reviews.comment: Some permissions are questionable. The Dev needs to explain why these permissions are needed. App works relatively well though.
reviews.author: Varakan Ashokumar

reviews.title: Functional but buggy
reviews.comment: On the GS3, when you\'re watching a video and the screen saver kicks in, the video would pause. When turn it on  and try to continue watching, it plays another random video.
reviews.author: Hiroo Tolani

reviews.title: A lot better
reviews.comment: Than it used to be.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great improvements!
reviews.comment: Keep them coming!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rough start. Finally seems to have gotten it right.
reviews.comment: Previous release was sluggish & painfully slow in playing videos. Next came a release that couldn\'t make it through its installation routine without crashing. This seems to have it right. Videos load quickly & play smoothly. From 1 star for crashing on install, to 4 stars for a solid build.
reviews.author: Jim Kirk

reviews.title: Way better
reviews.comment: Now that\'s more like it.
reviews.author: Dominic Turner

reviews.title: It Works! S3
reviews.comment: No problems yet. The interface is smooth and easy to use. Great way to get my Cnet fix.
reviews.author: Stevie O

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Buffers way too much. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: Rarely works.
reviews.author: A Google User
